channel.title: admin on Rafael Angarita
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Rafael Angarita

item.description: I am an Associate Professor of Computer Science since September 2022 at Paris Nanterre University where I teach about databases at the (Mathematics and Computer Science department) and a researcher at the Database Research Team at LIP6, Sorbonne University. From 2017 to 2022, I was at Isep where I was the head of the Information Systems track and program director of the Data Protection Officer Master and and Scientific Collaborator at Inria, MiMove team.
